availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on March 21, 1812 in Boone County, Kentucky. Finnell is listed as a farmer in 1850 and 1860. Served as Captain of the home guard in Verona, Boone County, Kentucky in 1861. Died on January 2, 1897 in Verona, Boone County, Kentucky.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, "Vardiman Finnell ( March 21, 1812 - January 2, 1897)," Memorial #80679440, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=80679440&ref=acom (accessedJune 26, 2017).; Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, District 2, p. 285; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Verona District, p. 232.
